summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates a wide range of general-purpose utility functions, including file discovery, reading, and age calculation, URL detection and manipulation, data conversion between strings and lists, dictionary key case handling, logging excerpt extraction, user confirmation prompts, and data type validation.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of shared helper utilities that support file I/O, configuration management, logging, and user interaction across the simulation tools, thereby reducing runtime errors and improving maintainability.
